### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    merchant_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    model_accuracy DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID,
    model_id UUID,
    prediction_result BOOLEAN,
    confidence DECIMAL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1, is_fraudulent = TRUE WHERE amount > 1000

### STATEMENT

UPDATE users SET email = CONCAT(name, '@example.com') WHERE name = 'John Doe'

);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE predictions SET confidence = confidence + 0.05 WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
